title: '3¬Ωmonth usage review (dont buy)'
body: Purchased this bag in March 2023 and writing this review in september 2023. 1st the bag handle which come out and get extend, it doesn't work properly, in my case the quality of that handle doesn't come out after half extend (most of the time) but i try to manage 45 days and then forget about the bag. After that again after 60days it comes easily but without pressing the handle lock aswell as i have to hlod the handle other wise handle go back to its original position. 2nd about the wheels they are smooth but some times it moves randomly something like zigzag. Other then this 2 problem the quality of the bag is good chain and lock system is are really very impressive. NOTE: When i try to make call for repair from amazon they told me to take pslip from order details and call to safari service center, I tried to reach to safari via call there is automatic call answer and say call from Monday to Saturday between 9 to 6 and if you connect on time and days there is the same automatic call answer, I have reached them via website and send them a mail still there is no response. AT THE END I WILL SUGGEST YOU DON'T BUY GO AND GET IT FROM STORE.

title: 'Do not buy'
body: Upon my first use, the handle disengaged, leaving me in quite a predicament. The quality of this product is severely lacking, and I would not recommend it to anyone. It's a frustrating and inconvenient purchase that failed to meet even the most basic expectations. Save your money and look for a more reliable option.
